author: cnbc.com
title: Mortgage Executive Magazine Names Primary Residential Mortgage, Inc. a Top 100 Mortgage Company
text:
Salt Lake City, May 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- For the second consecutive year, Primary Residential Mortgage, Inc . (PRMI), one of the nation’s top mortgage lenders, announced it has been named a Top 100 Mortgage Company in America by Mortgage Executive Magazine for 2017. PRMI ranked 24th for helping nearly 25,000 families and individuals finance their homeownership goals in 2017.
“We are honored to receive this recognition from Mortgage Executive Magazine for a second year in a row,” said David Zitting, President and CEO of PRMI. “We take pride in our industry-leading portfolio of loan products, innovative technology, and our dedication to providing excellent customer service. Being recognized for a second consecutive year really speaks to the caliber of our loan originators and employees as they provide personal and positive experiences throughout the entire loan process.”
In 2018, PRMI hopes to assist more than 30,000 individuals achieve their dream of homeownership. PRMI currently has 250 branches and licensing in 49 states across the nation. The company focuses primarily on traditional residential loan products, offering a wide variety of mortgage lending services, including adjustable and fixed-rate mortgages, reverse mortgages, purchase and refinance.
For more information about PRMI, visit www.PrimaryResidentialMortgage.com .
###
Primary Residential Mortgage, Inc. (PRMI) is a nationwide, multi-billion dollar franchise founded in 1998 by Dave Zitting and Jeff Zitting. Its top leaders are experts in the mortgage industry. PRMI was recently inducted into the 2018 Ellie Mae Hall of Fame for Excellence in Compliance and, for the last three years, has been named the Top Mortgage Employer by National Mortgage Professional Magazine. PRMI is an Equal Housing Lender. NMLS #3094.
